panels.description: Memory utilization similar to a visualization of the output of the Linux 'free' command.  Results are stacked such that the sum of all values at a point in time should equal total system memory.
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: System paging activity (typically flushing in-memory disk caches to the underlying storage).  Page out rate on the +axis, Page in rate on the -axis.
panels.title: Paging

panels.description: System swapping activity (utilizing swap space due to low memory).  Swap out rate on the +axis, Swap in rate on the -axis.  Assumes 4kB page size.
panels.title: Swapping

panels.description: Network bandwidth usage by interface, in bits/sec.  Outbound traffic on +axis, Inbound traffic on -axis
panels.title: Network Usage by Interface
